Biodiesel freegan craft beer odd future polaroid high life, kale chips pinterest messenger bag pickled tattooed scenester marfa wes anderson.

fields.title: Ballot Green
fields.blurb:
#### Simulate an election with person candidates here.

Ballots that involve Users as the candidates are currently the most annoying to set up, from an administrative standpoint (from an end-user perspective, it's totally painless.): they require two additional steps, which link the candidate on the ballot to the account of the user.

fields.title: Ballot Red
fields.blurb: #### I don't know why you would use this, but it's nice to have.

fields.title: Ballot Purple
fields.blurb: #### Simulate an election with non-person candidates here.

fields.title: Ballot Zed
fields.blurb: #### Again, don't know what you'd use this for, but you definitely can use it.

fields.name: Test Measure
fields.summary:
Art party vinyl Austin, bushwick farm-to-table williamsburg letterpress pickled DIY thundercats. Synth four loko ennui vice farm-to-table, brooklyn butcher truffaut swag brunch PBR. Skateboard vice readymade godard cosby sweater. Biodiesel freegan craft beer odd future polaroid high life, kale chips pinterest messenger bag pickled tattooed scenester marfa wes anderson. Forage lo-fi banh mi pickled, selvage biodiesel bespoke fap helvetica raw denim vinyl. Squid truffaut master cleanse brooklyn, typewriter american apparel cliche keffiyeh tofu sriracha pop-up next level flexitarian Austin. Umami photo booth american apparel banh mi fap helvetica.

Cosby sweater helvetica mustache +1 biodiesel lomo. Squid photo booth 8-bit, swag skateboard cardigan +1 aesthetic wes anderson butcher blog cray ethical umami. Messenger bag 3 wolf moon tofu artisan raw denim. Terry richardson pour-over carles, beard authentic ennui truffaut craft beer fap street art. 

Craft beer cliche squid bespoke quinoa, marfa leggings chillwave +1 tofu small batch vinyl master cleanse. Next level ethnic four loko echo park. Tumblr food truck seitan banh mi pork belly godard pinterest artisan truffaut, viral stumptown +1 sartorial PBR.

fields.name: Test Measure 2
fields.summary: * #### Measures can be scheduled. A measure needn't be ready immediately; feel free to set its vote-start date to any time you like. If all else fails, you can toggle its vote-ability with the is_open flag. * #### Measures require a description of some sort. This is negotiable, but I think it's good policy to be able to motivate the need for a measure. * #### Measures can be restricted to certain dorms, certain classes, and can ban specific users. But they don't have to. By default, all measures are open to the entire student body - and closed to anyone who isn't _currently_ attending Mudd. * #### Measures will automatically close the midnight after they reach whatever quorum is set for them. This is a nice feature, I think - though chronically late voters may learn new habits the hard way. * #### You can rearrange the position of the ballots. It's easy! You just type in some new numbers, and press 'save'. * #### Votes can be anonymous by default Or, not. Currently, there is no 'gradient' of anonymity; a vote in a ballot is either tied to a user, or not at all tied to a user. This means that anonymous ballots won't be able to generate as many stats as non-anonymous ballots. In a future release, there will be non-identifying metadata associated with a vote, in addition to a user, so that anonymous votes can still be demographically interesting.

fields.description: A proposal explaining the pros/cons of this option.
fields.title: Amendment 1

fields.description: You don't need to provide a description, as the candidate below has discovered:
fields.title: A non-user candidate with description

fields.description: The Select X type allows you to specify a maxmimum number of choices each user can make.
fields.title: candidate (non-user)

fields.description: Usually, you'll want this to be a smaller numer than the number of candidates on the ballot.
fields.title: candidate non-user again

fields.description: Otherwise, you could end up with an awkward election that didn't narrow anybody out.
fields.title: the black sheep candidate

fields.description: And, of course, descriptions can be provided if desired.
fields.title: A good choice

fields.description: Here's a candidate description that comes from a PersonCandidate, rather than a plain-old Candidate.
fields.title: Haakon Saxberg

fields.description: You can have multiple users in one candidate, which is useful for running as co-(presidents|vice-presidents|etc).
fields.title: Josiah Gaskin, Jessica Hester
